I don't like the way this sticker feels on my DANCE MACHINE. Do you?



GONDOLA tears off the STICKER in one satisfying motion. Having also peeled off most of the adhesive, the STICKER is transformed into a still-plausibly-useful STRIP OF PAPER.

STRIP OF PAPER GET!
